metadata.name: I Remember
metadata.description:
Note from Misucmaker;  
"Once upon a time, on a cloudy night during the pre-Covid quarantine, I felt that I had to move. That's when I recorded this track, "I Remember," with a clear mind and using low-cost headphones on my friend's laptop and keyboard. Eventually, I returned them, not intending to take them back again! This record appeared in one shot, so it sounds glitchy and quirky."

Note from Efula;  
"I listened to the track, and the funky basslines started to take form in the shape of these creatures...  forever dancing, ever moving...never giving up. They evolved into a tribe with a story. We named them Misuc, a creature born from Misucmaker's music through my synesthetic mind." 

Misuc is dancing like there's no tomorrow and trying to escape from an artificial realm to nature. Its dreams and memories are tied up to each other. It is hard to tell what is happening now and what is a memory.

I Remember marks the beginning of an audiovisual journey between Efula and Misucmaker. The sun will also rise upon this land. Love from the land of moment

Ankara, 2023 

For the whole story, visit: www.misuc.co
